mdRecord.dcterms:description: John Glover commissioned McKim, Mead & White to design that house and sold it almost immediately to New Yorkers Walter and Mary Ann Bruce Howe. The Howe family developed the property over the succeeding 50 years in consultation with the leading landscape architects and horticulturists of the day. -- http://wikimapia.org/11318893/Berry-Hill-1885 [work]
